page.title: 17Busy Road in Skegness
page.content: The busiest road in this area is Roman Bank. It starts at Skegness and ends at Ingoldmells. It is busy because people want to go to the beach. It leads to other places as well like Chapel and Boston. We did a traffic count along Roman Bank. In five minutes there were 110 cars, 10 lorries and vans and 3 buses. It is busier in the summer because of the visitors to the coast. The road runs parallel to the coast and has to be crossed to get to the beach. We have a pelican crossing and two zebra crossings in Winthorpe. We also have a subway just outside.
